assignments.description: Adding progress notes to collection to check for unsigned Addendums.
assignments.name: Add_Progress_Note_to_List
assignments.label: Add Progress Note to List

value.stringValue: “Writer of this note left VHA without completion and signing of this note. Signer was not writer of any information above this statement, signing for documentation of above noted care to be documented in Veteran record.”

decisions.description: Check to see if the progress note is signed before proceeding to the correct assignment.
decisions.name: Is_Progress_Note_Signed
decisions.label: Is Progress Note Signed?

Flow.description: Allows user with transfer work permission to reassign open cases to a new user ******** Queries and updated associated cases, progress notes, and addendums that were associated with the user that is being transferred from 2/15/2023: CCCM-30349 Changes CRM 1.10 - Transfer Work flow was updated to prevent Pharm III and VCV case/PN transfers.
Flow.label: Transfer Work From Former VA Employee

recordLookups.name: Get_Open_Cases_by_UserId
recordLookups.label: Get Open Cases by UserId
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) AND (4 OR 5 OR 6) AND NOT 7

recordLookups.description: Get unsigned Addendum related to Progress Note and case
recordLookups.name: Get_unsigned_Addendum
recordLookups.label: Get unsigned Addendum

fields.name: warningMessage
fields.fieldText: IMPORTANT! Is this the correct assignee/new owner?

fields.name: successDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Cases and Progress Notes have successfully transferred to {!Assign_Cases_to_New_Owner.selectedChoiceLabels}!

fields.name: CancelledText
fields.fieldText: The Transfer Work transaction has been cancelled

fields.name: Confirmation
fields.fieldText: IMPORTANT! Are you sure you want to transfer the open Cases and associated Progress Notes from {!Former_Employee_Name.selectedChoiceLabels} ({!formerEmployeeUser.Email}) to {!Assign_Cases_to_New_Owner.selectedChoiceLabels} ({!newEmployeeUser.Email})? This action cannot be undone!﻿
